website_summaries.verdict: This traditional-style meat tenderizer mallet offers a smooth side and a textured side. Easy to use.
pros: Customers like the size and grip quality of the handle
Simple design means cleaning this mallet couldn't be easier
Lasts a long time with a good build quality
cons: Tool's small size may not work for everyone, but it does make it easy to store

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than the aluminum one I had before. Grip is more comfortable and the tool is much heavier requiring less swing and tears up meat far less than my old one (have only used to flatten chicken so far). Appreciate that it's a single solid piece that's easy to clean without places where food can hide. My biggest concern when I bought this was the seemingly strange angle on the head but it actually works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RVA Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great little pounder
customer_reviews.text: MUCH better than the old wooden pounder I had. Heavy enough to do the job, yet light enough that it doesn't cause my arthritic thumb any pain. Doesn't show any abuse after I have abused it quite a bit and comes out of the dishwasher looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Encie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for chicken
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mallet that wouldn't pulverize chicken but had the weight and "handiness" to do the job. This one is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: It works but the head is seemingly small. I had to replace an old IKEA one I had that didn’t like the dishwasher. This one is good for that! No fun cleaning meat out in between the spikes.
customer_reviews.author: FilmComposer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved Damaged Item
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this in the mail. Has a nice heft to it and, while a little small, would work well for what I need. Unfortunately my excitement was short lived as i found one of the corners has damage to it already, which makes me question if it would even be a sturdy tool. Will be returning and shopping in person for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a 15 year old meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Our old one lost all of its coating years ago. When you used it, your hand turned black. I was also wondering if it was leaving metal on our food. Anyway, decided to replace the old one. This was is very nice. It has a nice weight and great grip. Plus, I can wash it in the dishwasher. My hands do not get weird marks on it now. I hope this one lasts me 15+ years as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steakman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any household!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have in the kitchen. Its easy to clean and I love the material its made of. I previously owned a different one that would stain my hands and meat but this one does not and its so much better. Its also the perfect weight and easy to handle by anyone. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy Veras

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and weight
customer_reviews.text: I like how heavy it feels and the size of the head with 2 different surfaces, smooth and textured. The size is good for big or small cuts of meat. The weight is so that you don't have to swing hard. It feels sturdy all the way to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Another great Oxo product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to a meat tenderizer... Oxo does a great job of making the handle comfortable to hold. Slightly more expensive than other meat tenderizers or my previous rubber mallet, but it certainly is nicer to use and I don't get weird looks for installing flooring, then going to the kitchen to pound some chicken cutlets.
customer_reviews.author: James Leong

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: So it was to my surprise that it is actually made of hard rubber and plastic. Only after a few uses the head ended up breaking. Luckily no one was injured.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoesnow

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Why has it taken me 25 years of marriage and cooking before I bought one of these? Great value, quality.
customer_reviews.author: dawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t like to get out their frustrations. It’s a little pricey but you know with OXO you’ll always get the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: sushi roll

customer_reviews.title: It tenderizes and is durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tenderizer because it is powder coated and should not lose its finish.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Danko

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and sturdy. Just the perfect weight and size for pounding meat. It would have been nicer if the material were all steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but not bad. I like that it’s got a little weight to it coNsidering it’s a tenderizer.
customer_reviews.author: Patyb707

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job so easily..OXO is always a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cmist13

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fist or a hammer
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. It works better than simply pounding on steak with my fist. It's actually very useful and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the weird angle of the head, but actually it’s perfect!! I had an older model that I loved as well, when it went missing this is an even better replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Adriyel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy enough and I like how it has the flat side. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but very sturdy. Handle has nice grip and the overall build is very good. Two sided and handles all types of jobs.
customer_reviews.author: stavano

customer_reviews.title: Tenderizer extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tenderizing chicken & anything else that needs it!
customer_reviews.author: SFsanibel

customer_reviews.title: Makes it so simple
customer_reviews.text: Never knew would make my life so easy! Why did I try to use a frying pan to flatten meat for so long?
customer_reviews.author: H.D. Dunfee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s been several months since received, still in good condition, quality seems good!
customer_reviews.author: luxia ding

customer_reviews.title: Typical OXO Quality
customer_reviews.text: When you need a new kitchen tool, OXO should be your go-to. They simply make the highest quality, most consistent stuff. I’d consider them the “Apple of Kitchen Tools”. Simple as that. This meat tenderizer is no exception. It has great heft, holds nicely in the hand, and looks great too. OXO is meticulous on their designs and for good reason. They just work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I went looking for a meat tenderizer at my local box store and found that around the studded area there were gaps filled in by glue. A perfect breading ground for bacteria etc. So I was very pleasantly surprised to see that the head of this one was all one solid piece without any seams. The weight of it is perfect. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Bams317

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, use, and hold, albiet wish it was even heavier
customer_reviews.text: Look this is a super nice and compact mallet. I personally would have loved it if it was a little heavier and longer, with a slightly larger face, but that hasn't prevented me from using it to hammer chicken into cutlets. I sometimes end up using it on it's side as the surface is larger for hammering.
customer_reviews.author: mu7

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Mine showed up extremely late due to being lost somewhere in the shipping system. They were knicks all over the sides of it, although it doesn’t affect the usage of it. Not sure if this thing is plastic or some sort of plastic coated metal though. It is not very heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my chef husband, and he loves it. Says it's a great weight and makes pounding out chicken or pork easy. This is one of the few that won't oxidise in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Langlois

customer_reviews.title: Great at Home Meat Tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Great Material and Good Build. I only wish it was little less heavy and the wand is a bit longer. Overall great buy and will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Our old one was damaged after putting into the dishwasher. Bought this one as it says dishwasher safe. Used couple times and it came out fine after cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wang

customer_reviews.title: Should it be bent like this?
customer_reviews.text: Literally just received and opened and there is a distinct “bend” where the head connects. Should it be like this? I’m not seeing it in any other customer photos.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Tool not Finished
customer_reviews.text: Hammer arrived unfinished- big hunks of materials stuck to head. I’m so sick of being ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  The shape makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.text: The slanted head makes the impact more even. It's easy to clean and looks very nice. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitched aide.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a meat hammer? it works! It is high quality, has a good weight and is easy to hold and handle.
customer_reviews.author: sonic

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product since my last one lost some kind of coating when it was put in the dishwasher. I won't put this one it it
customer_reviews.author: Ginger benckert

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than the traditional old aluminum ones. But, we like it better... Very dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Len V.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but would look for a different one
customer_reviews.text: Good but I don’t think it will last a long time. I don’t like the angle of it, it’s harder to use that way and I was hoping this meat tenderizer will be a little heavier
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not too heavy, and the grip feels comfy. Washes easily by hand too.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with just the right weight. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Roland W Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Design
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced and offset to adjust to position...good buy and value.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beating that meat just right! Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Team Tango

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE TO HOLD
customer_reviews.text: It’s all one piece and seems much more sanitary. I love it. I will never buy a metal one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F.

product_meta.title: NEW OXO Good Grips Meat Tenderizer
product_meta.description: Effortlessly prep your favorite cuts of meat with the OXO Good Grips Meat Tenderizer. This two-sided mallet lets you pound chicken flat for faster cooking or tenderize that flank steak for melt-in-your-mouth goodness. The pyramid-shaped teeth are perfect for breaking down tougher fibers to tenderize proteins and prepare them for marinating. The smooth side makes short work of flattening meats to a uniform thickness for even cooking. The angle and weight of the head are designed to maximize force without tiring you out. The soft handle fits comfortably in your hand while you work, while its non-slip grip provides traction even when wet. When you're done cooking, pop it in the dishwasher to clean and sanitize — it's dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Two-in-one tool for pounding and tenderizing poultry, pork and beef
Textured side has pyramid-shaped teeth ideal for tenderizing meat
Smooth side maximizes surface area to flatten meat quickly
Angle and weight of head are optimized for efficient flattening
Soft, non-slip grips for comfort and safety, even in wet hands
Made from BPA-free impact-resistant ABS plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars475 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
